state.description: Whether to install (C(present)), or remove (C(absent)) a package. The upgrade (C(latest)) operation will update/install the package to the latest version available. Note: The module has a limitation that (C(latest)) only works for one package, not lists of them.

site.description: Specifies the repository path to install the package from. Its global definition is done in C(/etc/opt/csw/pkgutil.conf).

update_catalog.description: If you want to refresh your catalog from the mirror, set this to (C(yes)).
